title: rads error
body:
i tried every thing  dns  and fire wall and system o'clock nothing worked for me still rads error i see the system file of rads and also 
DownloadPath = /releases/live
DownloadURL = l3cdn.riotgames.com
Region = EUNE
 nothing wrong soo what i do im gna goo crazy   the game its not opening i tried all all solutions

replies.body: try run as administrator or use lol.admin.exe its same folder as normal exe new win10 patch also fix today issue with patching lol so worth a try too

This error is likely caused by a pc setting that's blocking game files from being accessed.  Go through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access.  I hope that helps!
